title: Initial letters, untitled sans serif
content:
I have put down the first few lowercase letters of a new sans serif. Note the high x-height, the slanted ascenders (which are in vogue right now-overly trendy perhaps?). I welcome any comments to help improve the design and its usefulness.

Thank you,

JDooley

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FL Sample-New Sans.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011230457/http:/typophile.com/files/FL%20Sample-New%20Sans.pdf) | 8.5 KB |
author: Jeremy Dooley
